title: England set to discover results of Billy Vunipola's scan but are adamant they have able cover at No 8
text:
England insist they can cope if Billy Vunipola is ruled out of their final Pool C match against France, despite the absence of another specialist No 8 in their 31-man squad.

Vunipola was withdrawn at half-time of England’s 39-10 victory over Argentina at the Tokyo Stadium on Saturday after twisting an ankle and he must wait until today to discover the results of a scan.

England will not take any risks with the Saracens forward, who has started all 12 Tests this year, having already secured qualification for the quarter-finals after three wins.

It is likely that Tom Curry, the Sale Sharks...
description: England insist they can cope if Billy Vunipola is ruled out of their final Pool C match against France, despite the absence of another specialist No 8 in their 31-man squad.
